Blue elements is a new narrative built from fragments of old stories

Stories of kings and queens; Chinese flower patterns; the infinity of blue; and a brave designer who dismantled a 240-year-old design tradition to bring it together and bring it to life in a new form.

Louise Campbellâ€™s Blue Elements is a spectacular mixture of Flora Danica, Blue Fluted Plain and the classic flutes. A playful use of classical elements, where flowers grow wild, flutes suddenly turn smooth and the edge is interrupted by lace rim.
